Package org.aavso.tools.vstar.data.validation

Interface Summary
IFieldInfoSource This interface must be implemented by any class wanting to be a source of field name to index information.
 

Class Summary
AAVSODownloadFormatValidator This class accepts a line of text for tokenising, validation, and ValidObservation instance creation given an AAVSO Download text format source: JD(0), MAGNITUDE(1), UNCERTAINTY(2), HQ_UNCERTAINTY(3), BAND(4), OBSERVER_CODE(5), COMMENT_CODE(6), COMP_STAR_1(7), COMP_STAR_2(8), CHARTS(9), COMMENTS(10), TRANSFORMED(11), AIRMASS(12), VALFLAG(13), CMAG(14), KMAG(15), HJD(16), NAME(17), MTYPE(18) REQ_VSTAR_AAVSO_DATA_DOWNLOAD_FILE_READ From Doc, Dec 22 2009: "OK, the data download has been changed so that the end of it is now Star Name, affiliation, mtype, group.
AAVSOFormatFieldInfoSource Field and column information source for AAVSO Download file format and database sourced observations.
AbstractStringValidator<T> This is the base class for all string-based validators.
CKMagValidator This is a validator for CMag and KMag field values.
CommentCodeValidator A comment code field validator.
CommonTextFormatValidator This class accepts a line of text for tokenising, validation, and ValidObservation instance creation that is common to all text format sources.
CompStarValidator This is a validator for comparison star (1 and 2) field values.
ExclusiveRangePredicate Exclusive numeric range predicate class: lower < value < upper
InclusiveRangePredicate Inclusive numeric range predicate class: lower <= value <= upper
JulianDayValidator This class validates provided text as a Julian Day.
MagnitudeFieldValidator This class represents a magnitude value including uncertainty and fainter-than values.
MagnitudeValueValidator This class validates magnitude values (e.g.
MTypeValidator A magnitude type (mtype) field validator.
ObserverCodeValidator This class validates an observer code.
OptionalityFieldValidator This class validates fields as optional or non-optional, returning the field or null.
RangePredicate This abstract base class represents a predicate involving a numeric range.
RegexValidator This class validates strings using regular expressions.
SimpleFormatFieldInfoSource Simple file format field information source.
SimpleTextFormatValidator This class accepts a line of text for tokenising, validation, and ValidObservation instance creation given a simple text format source: JD MAG [UNCERTAINTY] [OBSCODE] [VALFLAG] REQ_VSTAR_SIMPLE_TEXT_FILE_READ
TransformedValidator This class validates the 'transformed' field.
UncertaintyValueValidator This class specialises magnitude value validator to handle optional uncertainty values.
ValflagValidator This class validates a valflag.
